content: learn how to crochet this super cute and easy amigurumi ghost a very simple pattern your ghost can stand on his own and he has a posable sheet - use as a standalone figure or turn your ghost friend into a keychain or garland any white yarn - for my ghosts i used lion brand diy glow yarn and patons smoothie dk yarn scrap of pink yarn for the blush black yarn for the mouth 4mm crochet hook 6mm safety eyes scissors large eye needle polyfil stuffing
